description: Many pages are missing meta descriptions, which are important for SEO and click-through rates.
solution: Add unique meta descriptions to all pages, keeping them between 150-160 characters and including target keywords.

description: Found internal links pointing to non-existent pages (404 errors).
solution: Update broken internal links to point to the correct pages or remove them if no longer needed.

description: Some images are too large and may slow down page loading times.
solution: Optimize images by compressing them and using appropriate formats (WebP, AVIF) for better performance.

description: Images without alt text affect accessibility and SEO.
solution: Add descriptive alt text to all images to improve accessibility and help search engines understand content.

description: Multiple pages have identical title tags, which can hurt SEO performance.
solution: Create unique, descriptive title tags for each page that accurately reflect the page content.

description: Page loading times are above recommended thresholds (3+ seconds).
solution: Optimize CSS, JavaScript, and images. Consider using a CDN and enabling compression.

description: Some pages are missing H1 tags, which are important for SEO structure.
solution: Add a single, descriptive H1 tag to each page that includes the main keyword.

description: Pages with very little content may not rank well in search results.
solution: Expand content on these pages to provide more value to users and search engines.
